subtitleNullable: Ongoing web-scraping of Twitter following the news of a SCOTUS draft opinion
descriptionNullable:
Following the leak of the drafted majority SCOTUS opinion on Roe V Wade, I began running a bot on an hourly basis to gather tweets as the news was breaking all over the country. The parameters for the search were chosen in part due to the time I personally spend on Twitter, and as such, likely do not represent a comprehensive search. Any feedback to grow this search in a more comprehensive way is welcomed, and will be updated accordingly.

"searchTerms": [
    "Roe V Wade",
    "Ginsburg",
    "SCOTUSBlog",
    "SCOTUS",
    "Supreme Court",
    "Supreme Court of the United States",
    "Pelosi",
    "Clinton",
    "Bernie",
    "Biden",
    "Sanders",
    "Republicans",
    "Democrats",
    "Liberals",
    "Conservatives"
  ]
